episodes.title: Cult or Church? Inside the $50M Forced-Labor Allegations vs David E. Taylor (REPORT)
episodes.description:
🎵 Stream Uncle Mike's Album Now:
👉 https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/mikecrosstheboss/uncle-mikes-truth-on-beats

🔥 YouTube Secrets 👉 https://themusicrecordingnetwork.com/3-free-youtube-tips-2/

REPORT: Federal agents arrested David E. Taylor (Kingdom of God Global Church / JMMI) and Michelle Brannon after a grand jury indicted them on forced-labor and money-laundering charges tied to a multi-state donation “call-center” network. We break down the indictment, raids, survivor claims, and what happens next. (All defendants deny criminal wrongdoing unless/until proven in court.) 

#DavidETaylor #KOGGC #JMMI #FBI #ForcedLabor #ChurchScandal #CultExposed #DOJ #Houston #Tampa #Detroit #Ocala #UncleMike
